name: Cubenry
description:
Cubenry is a game where you are a block with arms and can use guns somehow. Due to the game's incompleteness, there are no goals and objectives.

Controls
  • [W] [A] [S] [D] - Move
  • [Space] - Jump
  • [E] - Pickup Item, Interact
  • Mouse Movement - Aim
  • [LEFT MOUSE] - Punch, Fire Weapon, Consume Food, etc.
  • [1] [2] [3] [4] [5] [6] - Select Inventory Slot

(Yes, I try to make your life easier by letting you change the hotkeys.) (Oh, and controller support is barely implemented.)

As of right now, there are four 'levels':
  1. Origins of Cubenry - Basically a sandbox
  2. Chaos City - How long can you survive while dealing with thirty blocks murdering each other?
  3. Chaos City Teamed - You and your sixteen blocks fight the other sixteen opponents
  4. Tutorial World - Self explanatory
Since the game is not complete, expect it to have the following:
  • goofy ass graphics
  • the map looks more like guacamole
  • lots of placeholder textures
  • i have social anxiety pls dont hate me

(I don't have a GitHub page, so if you have a bug report, store that inside your brain until I know how to set up one)
